item.title: Short Form Content Expert - Testimonial Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hey team,

We need a short form content expert to join our company and edit, colour grade and create in tandem with our art director a testimonial video we will run ads for on FB/IG.

This role will and can become an ongoing contractor role for the right individual, we believe in creating lasting relationships with amazing people and in turn will constantly provide work.

The footage has been shot, both the testimonial video, the B-ROLL, however; we need you to work in Tandem with our art director and create custom captions using our fonts and colours and using our trademarked 3D branded elements as the icons during the captions. It also needs to be colour graded to match the vibe of our company.

This may also include creating and animating an intro/outro if that is something you’re confident in.

The budget can change for the right skill level.

Looking forward to meeting you,
M

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 29, 2024 00:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Videography, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Videography, Explainer Video
Country: Australia

item.title: Video Editing and Graphic Design Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
I will be hiring somone within the  hours and need this job completed tonight.
We are looking for a skilled video editor and graphic design specialist to edit 4 videos into one seamless video.

Total length of video is about 9 minutes
The main tasks will involve adjusting audio, lighting, and subtitles to enhance the overall quality and ensure viewer engagement. Additionally, some light graphic work will be required to minimize viewer fatigue.

The ideal candidate should have expertise in video editing software, color grading, audio mixing, and graphic design tools.

Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines are essential. This is a great opportunity for someone who enjoys combining technical skills with artistic vision to create compelling videos.

If you cannot start within the hour, please do not bid on this job.
Examples of your work are required.

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 29, 2024 00:46 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Video Editor Needed for Golf YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I run a golf YouTube channel and need a skilled video editor to make edits to my videos. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing, a good eye for detail, and the ability to enhance the visual and audio quality of the content.

**Responsibilities:**
- Edit golf videos for my YouTube channel, ensuring high-quality output
- Add appropriate transitions, effects, and graphics
- Improve audio and video quality
- Ensure the final product aligns with the channel's style and branding

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience in video editing, preferably with YouTube content
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong attention to detail
- Ability to meet deadlines and work independently

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Familiarity with golf and related terminology
- Experience with YouTube SEO and video optimization techniques

Please provide samples of your previous work, especially any relevant to sports or YouTube content. Looking forward to working with a talented editor who can help enhance my channel!

Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 00:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Videography, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Videography, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Wedding Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We need a great wedding video editor to edit our. weddings. We are a relatively new company that specializes in creating unique and personalized wedding videos for our clients. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality, emotional and engaging videos that capture the special moments of our clients' big day.

As a wedding video editor, you will play a crucial role in helping us achieve our goal of providing exceptional services to our clients. Your main responsibility will be to take raw footage from multiple cameras and transform it into a beautiful and cohesive narrative that tells the story of each couple's love story.

To do this effectively, you must have strong technical skills in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. You should also have an eye for visual storytelling and the ability to bring emotion to life through your editing techniques.

In addition to technical skills, you must also have strong communication and collaboration skills. You will be working closely with our clients to understand their vision for their wedding video and incorporating their feedback into the final product. This requires clear communication and the ability to work well in a team setting.

We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality, emotional, and engaging videos that capture the special moments of our clients' big day. Our videos are not just a collection of footage but rather a curated experience that transports viewers back to the emotions and memories of the wedding day.



Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 00:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Videography, Audio Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Videography, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Master of Ceremonies for Opening and Awards Ceremonies - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Master of Ceremonies (MC) to host our upcoming opening and awards ceremonies. The MC will be responsible for engaging and entertaining the audience throughout the event, introducing speakers and performers, and ensuring the smooth flow of the program. The ideal candidate should have excellent public speaking skills, a charismatic personality, and the ability to captivate a large audience. Previous experience as an MC for similar events is required.

Skills required:
- Strong verbal communication
- Stage presence
- Ability to engage and entertain an audience
- Event coordination
- Time management

We are looking for an intermediate level MC who can confidently handle the responsibilities of the role.

Budget: $500

item.title: Video editing and ad creation for three facebook/instagram ads - Upwork
item.description:
I am in need of video editing services, as well as creatives for creating scroll stopping video ads for my new offer I am launching. I have my ad scripts written and I am now looking to find someone who can help me create the visual content to go along with the scripts. I have no problem shooting video of myself, however I need someone to take that video and make it look professional and add flare and character to it so that it stops the scroll and will help lead to conversions.

I have the ability to shoot raw footage in front of a green screen. I can share multiple styles of video and record multiple shots of the same script. I can also record audio that can be dubbed over visuals. I'm looking for someone to guide me in what I should create and then create the stunning visual content I need to generate quality leads and conversion.

item.title: Video Editor for Top YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video editor for my sports analytics channel...we get about 500,000-1,000,000 views per vid. I need someone who can dedicate roughly 30 hours a week (minimum) and improve the pace without sacrificing production quality. Take a look at the video below for reference to quality...it is incredibly important that someone have enough experience or drive to intuitively be able to take footage and a script (with an animatic) and make something like this. I have been doing it on my own, so I know what it takes, but I need someone talented who will work hard to increase our pace and help take this to the top.


https://youtu.be/IfyQehz8dTg



Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 23:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing

item.title: TikTok video creator - Upwork
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I am looking for a TikTok video creator and TikTok manager. This will be a brand new TikTok created. The theme of the TikTok is lifestyle/ mothers/ soft life/ easy life… here is what to except…

- We will meet biweekly to generate content ideas (later we will Move to monthly meetings)
- I will record videos and audio and share them with you
- you will create TikTok videos with captions, hashtags, etc
- you will post 2 videos per week


To apply, please send me video content you've created and edited for YouTube.

item.title: UGC video editor needed for new YT channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone with experience in making UGC content. I will be providing the script and voiceover, and need someone to pull relevant footage related to the script. Some of the video footage can be provided, but you will need to find additional footage.

Please share some samples of YouTube channels you are currently working on & UGC videos

The topic of the channel will be obscure Wikipedia articles. The first video will be regarding the death of Mussolini. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benito_Mussolini#Death
Some footage can be found on the wikipedia, however you will need to source more footage, and match the script to the video

Please only apply if you have experience making UGC content, and are not an agency.

If you have read the entire post, please start your proposal with: "I am not an agency"

* I will hire 3-4 freelancers to create a 1 minute sample video and based on that will chose who to hire for the channel * IF successful, this could become a long term relationship.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 23:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Data Entry, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Data Entry, YouTube Marketing
Country: Canada
click to apply
